verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H7971>"Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me.
"For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> [them] <S%H7971>go,<s%> and <S%H5750>continue<s%> to <S%H2388>hold<s%> them,

<S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1961>come<s%> [with] a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> on your <S%H4735>livestock<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> on the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> on the <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> on the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> on the <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and on the <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

"But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6395>make<s%> a <S%H6395>distinction<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> so that <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that belongs to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"' "

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4150>definite<s%> <S%H4150>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> but of the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was not <S%H5704>even<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%> But the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H3513>hardened,<s%> and he did not <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> for yourselves <S%H4393>handfuls<s%> <S%H2651><s%> of <S%H6368>soot<s%> from a <S%H3536>kiln,<s%> and let <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>throw<s%> it toward the <S%H8064>sky<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>become<s%> fine <S%H80>dust<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7822>boils<s%> <S%H9457>breaking<s%> out with <S%H76>sores<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

So they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6368>soot<s%> from a <S%H3536>kiln,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>threw<s%> it toward the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H7822>boils<s%> <S%H9457>breaking<s%> out with <S%H76>sores<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7822>boils,<s%> for the <S%H7822>boils<s%> were on the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> as well as on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7925>"Rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H7971>"Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me.

"For <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4046>plagues<s%> on you and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5668>so<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Me in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"For [if by] <S%H6258>now<s%> I had <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> you would then have been <S%H3582>cut<s%> <S%H3582>off<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"But, <S%H199>indeed,<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5668>cause<s%> I have allowed you to <S%H5975>remain,<s%> in <S%H5668>order<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> you My <S%H3581>power,<s%> and in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H5608>proclaim<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H5750>"Still<s%> you <S%H5549>exalt<s%> yourself against My <S%H5971>people<s%> by not <S%H7971>letting<s%> them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> I will <S%H4305>send<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as has not <S%H1961>been<s%> [seen] in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> it was <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore <S%H7971>send,<s%> <S%H5756>bring<s%> your <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have in the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H5756>safety.<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> and is not <S%H622>brought<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> when the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H3381>comes<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on them, will <S%H4191>die.<s%>"' "

The <S%H4480>one<s%> among the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> who <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>livestock<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> into the <S%H1004>houses;<s%>

but he <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7760>paid<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7760>regard<s%> <S%H3820><s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>livestock<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> that <S%H1259>hail<s%> may <S%H1961>fall<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and on <S%H929>beast<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1980>ran<s%> down to the <S%H776>earth.<s%> And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

So there was <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3947>flashing<s%> continually in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as had not <S%H1961>been<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H9241>since<s%> it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

And the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that was in the <S%H7704>field<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> the <S%H1259>hail<s%> also <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H7665>shattered<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H7534>Only<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [were,] there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1259>hail.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H6471>this<s%> <S%H6471>time;<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>one,<s%> and I and my <S%H5971>people<s%> are the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>ones.<s%>

<S%H6279>"Make<s%> <S%H6279>supplication<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for there has been <S%H7227>enough<s%> of God's <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1259>hail;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>let<s%> you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and you shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "As soon as I <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> out my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> will <S%H2308>cease,<s%> and there will be <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H776>earth<s%> is the Lord's.
"But as for you and your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you do not <S%H2962>yet<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"
(Now the <S%H6594>flax<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley<s%> were <S%H5221>ruined,<s%> for the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was in the <S%H24>ear<s%> and the <S%H6594>flax<s%> was in <S%H1392>bud.<s%>
But the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H3698>spelt<s%> were not <S%H5221>ruined,<s%> for they [ripen] <S%H648>late.<s%>)

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3709>hands<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> and <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> longer <S%H5413>poured<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

But when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4306>rain<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> had <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> he and his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he did not <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
